org.codemonkey.simplejavamail

Class Recipient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codemonkey.simplejavamail.Recipient

  • public final class Recipient
extends Object
    An immutable recipient object, with a name, emailadres and recipient type (eg Message.RecipientType.BCC).
    Author:
    Benny Bottema
